import React ,{useState}from 'react' import '../styles/login.css' import{Container,Row,Col,Form,FormGroup,Button} from 'reactstrap' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import registerImg from '../assets/images/register.png' const Register = () => { const [credentials, setCredentials] = useState({ userName:undefined, email:undefined, password:undefined }); const handleChange = e =>{ setCredentials(prev => ({ ...prev, [e.target.id]: e.target.value})) } const handleClick = e => { e.preventDefault(); } return (
